name: Total Football (2023)
description:
Take TOTAL control of your FOOTBALL team across a variety of modes in this turn based strategy game.
Trade players, build your team, and take to the pitch!

Choose your team
Strategise the best formation
Build your squad
Decide the best plays on the pitch
Score, and WIN!

Quickplay:
Pick a team and opposition from any and all available teams or choose at random
Plan your strategy, decide your team's formation, and build your 11 man squad from a 22 player team
Take to the field, outscore your opponent and win
A mode for quick one off games vs the game AI

VS mode:
2 player local competitive coop
Take turns picking teams from any and all available teams or choose at random
Build your formations and put together your squads
Go head to head to see who is the superior manager and tactician

Career mode:
Pick a team to take TOTAL control of
Get placed into a 10 team league of similarly matched opposing teams
Customise your team's name, kit, and emblem/logo
Trade players with teams both in and out of your league
Grow your 22 player squad or grow your bank balance and save up for star players
Face off against the teams in your league across a 36 match season
Scout opposition squads before you play them to prepare a counter strategy
Keep track of players changing form and new skills across the season to gain an edge over your competition
Fight to avoid relegation and earn your way to the top and promotion spots
Play endless seasons to build your team's legacy

Cup mode:
Create your tournament, your way
Name your Cup, choose from single or double elimination, and decide the number of teams (the only limit is how many teams are in the game, if you want a bigger tournament just create more career save files)
Choose a team to lead to glory
Choose your opposition or select them at random
Build your best starting 11 and fight your way to the end
Scout opposition squads before you play them to prepare a counter strategy
Keep track of players rapidly changing form across the tournament to make sure you always have the best starting 11
Be the last team standing to take the trophy

Settings:
Variable game/turn length, make your games as fast or slow as you prefer
Player generation customisation:
before creating a new career you can fully customise how all the players appearances will be generated
choose the frequency of beards, baldness, and uncommon hair, skin, and eye colour
edit, add, or delete any hair, skin, or eye colour, both common and uncommon, as you desire
make your save file feel south american, nordic, or turn everyone into green skinned ogres, the choice is entirely up to the player

Made by Cameron James Low
Game Design by Lewis Alexander Low
